projects.title: Gistana (WebGIS Destana)
projects.description: Gistana (WebGIS Destana) is a WebGIS that presents evacuation routes and gathering points in several villages in the Bulawa district, Bone Bolango Regency, Gorontalo, Indonesia.

projects.title: Anonymsg
projects.description: An anonymous messaging platform for you to share your opinions freely without fear of other people's judgment

projects.title: Kabupaten Gorontalo GIS
projects.description: Kabupaten Gorontalo GIS (KabGGIS) is a WebGIS that provides geospatial information on agricultural areas in Gorontalo Regency, Gorontalo, Indonesia.

projects.title: Ingridentify
projects.description: Ingridentify is an app that uses AI and computer vision to recognize fruits and vegetables, addressing meal planning, unhealthy eating habits, and food waste.

projects.title: KSL Website
projects.description: The official website of the Kelompok Studi Linux Universitas Negeri Gorontalo, which is used for new member registration.

projects.title: Sea Cinema
projects.description: Seacinema is a functioning movie booking website that allows users to book tickets for movies, view movie details, and view their booking history.
